description: Manifest for different versions, modules, or configurations within the Unified-AI-Project. This helps track the evolution and state of various components.

versions.title: MikoAI v1 (Legacy Snapshot)
versions.description: Original MikoAI v1. Early prototype, static template dialogues, no persistent memory or self-updating logic. For functional demo and structural reference.

versions.title: MikoAI v2 (Legacy Snapshot)
versions.description: MikoAI v2. Initial memory and preference simulation, modular architecture, conditional logic, context-based tone changes. Prone to memory errors.

versions.title: MikoAI v3 (Legacy Snapshot)
versions.description: MikoAI v3. Emergent behavior construction, self-formula updates, 'data life' prototype traits.

versions.title: Fragmenta Core (Legacy Snapshot)
versions.description: Core modules and concepts from the Fragmenta project, focusing on layered processing and tone analysis.

versions.title: Angela AI v6.2.0 - Production Release (Phase 14 Complete)
versions.description: Production-ready cross-platform digital life system with Live2D, biological simulation, self-awareness and real execution capabilities. Features desktop companion, mobile bridge, A/B/C security system, and comprehensive AI capabilities.
features: Cross-platform support (Windows, macOS, Linux, Android, iOS)

author: Angela AI Development Team (Original MikoAI: Uo Cx)
notes: This manifest tracks major versions and component states for the Angela AI (Unified-AI-Project). Current production version is v6.2.0 (Phase 14 Complete, 99.2% completion). The project has evolved from early MikoAI and Fragmenta prototypes into a production-ready cross-platform digital life system.
